description: A condense format for includin all token-level samples in the training dataset

data.description: Each element represents one sample of the model input

labels.description: A mapping from label_id to label_name

files.description: A list of strings representing the file names for the i-th object in data

problematic_items.description: [Optional] A list of indices indiciating the possible problematic_items for tokenizers

label_counts.description: [Optional] A mapping for label_name and count of samples (tokens) in training dataset

words.description: A list of individual string words in this page. Empty token ("") should be removed.

bbox.description: A list of bounding boxes ([x1, y1, x2, y2]) for each token in the same order as words

labels.description: A list of label_id for each token

block_ids.description: [Optional] A list of ids for the corresponding block for the each token. Used for constructing block embeddings, etc

line_ids.description: [Optional] A list of ids for the corresponding line for the each token. Used for constructing line embeddings, etc

fonts.description: [Optional] A list of font names for the corresponding block for each token. Used for constructing font embeddings
